description:
Welcome to your ultimate shopping destination where everything you need, from fashion and beauty to home essentials and more, comes together in one place. Enjoy amazing deals, top brands, the latest trends, and so much more!

WELCOME DISCOUNT

First impressions matter, right? That’s why we’ve got an exclusive discount code waiting for you on your first order. Just download Trendyol and claim your welcome treat."

MORE ABOUT THE APP

Trendyol is your go-to shopping platform, making shopping easy and seamless. As you swipe through thousands of global, local and Turkish brands and millions of products, you’ll find a new trend waiting at every scroll. Planning outfits? Tracking orders? Enjoying free returns? It’s all a breeze. Here’s a tip: mark your faves and we’ll let you know when the prices drop. Download the Trendyol app today and start exploring!"

MORE ABOUT TRENDYOL

With our wide selection of clothing, footwear, accessories, home essentials, beauty must-haves, electronics, and more, Trendyol transforms shopping into an experience that’s accessible and budget-friendly. Trendyol Collection translates the latest runway trends into wearable outfits for every style, occasion and budget. Our lines range from a glamorous party selection (Trendyol Party) and a casual jeans collection (Trendyol Denim) to modest fashion looks (Trendyol Modest) and a plus-size collection (Trendyol Curve)."

Now it’s your turn to embrace your unique style from casual and relaxed to elegant and stylish with on-trend fashion pieces for women, men, and kids from Trendyol Collection. Beyond our exclusive brand Trendyol Collection, we also feature some of your most-loved brands such as: Nike, New Balance, Birkenstock, Crocs, Ray-Ban, Skechers, Adidas, Apple, Korkmaz, Samsung, Philips, Almufarrej, Karaca, Home Box, Dyson, Stanley, Lego, Madame Coco, Xiaomi, NA-KD, Converse, Jack & Jones, Dr. Martens, Calvin Klein and more.

Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the Trendyol app. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

DSK Mobile
Bank here and now 
We’ve made managing your finances simple, quick, and totally digital. No more waiting in lines or filling out endless paperwork – everything you need is right here.
Take control of your money, anywhere, anytime with DSK Mobile. Become a client without visiting an office – just follow the 5-minute digital onboarding process!
Keep track where your money goes
-	See all your accounts and transactions in one place
-	Enjoy a free savings feature that works for you
Tap, set, go – your cards, your rules
-	Approve online payments with a single tap
-	View your card details and copy the number in seconds
-	Add a card to your digital wallet, even before it arrives
-	Activate your new or replacement card in the app 
-	Instantly block your card, if it’s lost or stolen
-	Set your daily spending limits for better control
Pay your way, instantly
-	Easier transfer verification with biometrics or PIN 
-	Blink P2P: send money in seconds, only mobile number required
-	IBAN transfers: fast, secure, and simple
-	Currency transfers: because flexibility matters
-	Preferential currency exchange rate between own accounts.
Simplify Your Bills, all-in-one 
-	Add all your utility bills using your customer number
-	Track and pay everything in the app with a single tap
-	Make budget payments quickly and easily
Get the cash you need, fast
-	Apply for a personal loan with approval in 5 minutes
-	See the maximum amount and decide how to use it
-	Seamless experience, digital signature and no paperwork 
-	Funds transfer directly to your account
Mobile banking, the way it should be.

DSK Mobile
Банкирай тук и сега.
Управлението на финанси вече е лесно, бързо и изцяло дигитално. Забрави опашките и безкрайното попълване на документи – всичко, от което имаш нужда, е тук.
Разполагай с парите си навсякъде и по всяко време с DSK Mobile. Стани клиент за 5 минути онлайн, без да посещаваш офис.
Имаш пълен контрол: 
-	Следи всички сметки и трансакции на едно място
-	Заделяй с лекота с безплатна спестовна компонента 
Твоите карти, твоите правила:
-	Одобрявай онлайн плащания с един клик
-	Виж детайли на картата и копирай номера за секунди
-	Добави карта към дигитален портфейл, още преди да пристигне
-	Активирай нова или преиздадена карта в приложението
-	Блокирай веднага, ако картата е загубена или открадната
-	Настрой твоите 24-часови лимити за по-добър контрол
Плащай, както ти харесва:
-	Потвърждение на преводи с биометрия или PIN
-	Blink P2P преводи: за секунди само по мобилен номер
-	IBAN преводи: бързо, лесно и сигурно 
-	Валутни преводи: за да не пропускаш възможности
-	Преводи между собствени сметки: с преференциален валутен курс 
Винаги ти излизат сметките:
-	Следи и плащай битови си сметки с един клик
-	Плащай онлайн и твоите данъци 
-	Въведи клиентски номер, за да добавиш сметка
-	Твоите месечни задължения ще излизат в приложението
Когато имаш нужда, решението е бързо:
-	Заяви потребителски кредит с одобрение до 5 минути
-	Виж максималната сума, избери колко и как да използваш
-	Опростен процес, дигитален подпис, без физически документи
-	Парите пристигат директно по сметката ти
Мобилното банкиране, което заслужаваш.

Google Gemini app is your personal, proactive and powerful AI assistant.

With Gemini on your iPhone or iPad, you can:

– Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything that you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
– Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, Audio Overviews and more
– Connect with your favourite Google apps, like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail and more
– Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals and real-world examples
– Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to any time, anywhere
– Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
– Plan trips better and faster
– Get summaries, deep dives and source links, all in one place
– Brainstorm new ideas or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana: State-of-the-art image generation and editing built on Gemini 2.5 Flash


Level up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Plus plan – unlock new and powerful features to boost your creativity and productivity:
– Get more access to our most powerful models, like 2.5 Pro
– Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
– Turn words into high-quality, eight-second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast and more.

Google AI Plus includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Plus, will be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan, which helps you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy an industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 2.5 Pro, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast.

Gemini in Google AI Pro includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Pro subscription. The Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan – unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google's most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and unlock Gemini 2.5 Deep Think. You'll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

The Google Gemini mobile app is available in selected languages and countries. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/iosrequirements

Gemini Live feature availability varies based on language. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/ioslanguages

While Gemini can help you with many tasks like checking the weather, giving directions, and finding and summarising information across the web and apps, Gemini does not yet support device actions like setting an alarm, sending a text message and others on iOS.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
g.co/gemini/privacynotice

Introducing ChatGPT for iOS: OpenAI’s latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the latest from OpenAI, including the new image generator.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you’ll find:

· Image generation–Generate original images from a description, or transform existing ones with a few simple words. 
· Advanced Voice Mode–Tap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go. Settle a dinner table debate, or practice a new language. 
· Photo upload—Snap or upload a picture to transcribe a handwritten recipe or get info about a landmark. 
· Creative inspiration—Find custom birthday gift ideas or create a personalized greeting card.
· Tailored advice—Talk through a tough situation, ask for a detailed travel itinerary, or get help crafting the perfect response. 
· Personalized learning—Explain electricity to a dinosaur-loving kid or easily brush up yourself on a historic event.
· Professional input—Brainstorm marketing copy or map out a business plan.
· Instant answers—Get recipe suggestions when you only have a few ingredients.

Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

Terms of service & privacy policy:
https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

Доставките не трябва да бъдат изненада, а пратките – усложнение. С приложението SAMEDAY ти контролираш своите пратки. За очаквани пратки можеш да проследиш доставката в реално време до избрания адрес, да промениш дестинацията, да извършиш плащане или да отложиш доставката. Проследявай и управлявай пратките си на едно място – директно в приложението. Изтегли SAMEDAY app и се наслади на свободата от безпроблемни доставки и супер функционалности!

Очакваш пратка с доставка до easybox? 

Когато ти е нужно повече време, можеш да удължиш безплатния период за съхранение с още 24 часа от момента на зареждане на пратката в easybox.

Избрал/а си доставка до адрес от Sameday? С приложението SAMEDAY можеш:

◆ Да проследяваш доставката в реално време 

Не се притеснявай, че ще изпуснеш куриера, докато си в магазина! Приложението SAMEDAY ще те уведоми до 2 часа преди доставката, а чрез интерактивната карта можеш да видиш колко спирки му остават преди да стигне до теб. 

◆ Да платиш наложен платеж с карта директно в приложението 

Ако предпочиташ да платиш наложен платеж, вече не е нужно да имаш пари в брой при получаване. Можеш да платиш онлайн, директно в приложението, от момента в който пратката е предадена на куриер.

◆ Да пренасочиш до easybox пратка с доставка до адрес

Ако пратката ти е с доставка до адрес, можеш лесно да я пренасочиш към някой от над 800 easybox автомата в България, стига да отговаря на условията за доставка в easybox. 

◆ Да пренасочиш пратката към друг адрес 

Ако плановете ти са се променили, можеш да пренасочиш пратката към съсед или друг удобен адрес, от момента в който тя е предадена на куриер.

◆ Да отложиш доставката 

Без повече притеснения от връщане, когато си извън града! Отложи доставката до избрания адрес с до 5 дни в София или до 2 дни в други населени места в България, след като пратката е предадена на куриер.
Други функционалности в приложението SAMEDAY: 

◆ Винаги имаш под ръка PIN/QR код за валидиране на доставката. 
◆ Можеш да провериш очакваното време за доставка в менюто „Детайли за пратката“. 
◆ Можеш да запазиш адреси за доставка и любими easybox устройства. 
◆ Можеш да добавиш банкови карти за по-бързо плащане. 
◆ Виждаш статус на всички пратки, свързани с телефонния номер, използван при регистрация. Имаш достъп до историята на пратките за последните 90 дни.
◆ Можеш да анулираш доставка до адрес, когато пратката е предадена на куриер.

Pluxee – Your Benefits, Made Simple
Discover a smarter way to enjoy your employee benefits with the Pluxee app.
Check your balance, track your spending in real-time, and find new places to enjoy your benefits — all in one simple, secure app.
What You Can Do with Pluxee:

- Check Your Balance Anytime
Stay on top of your spending with real-time updates on your balance and transactions.
-  Discover Nearby Places

Find partner locations near you where you can use your benefits — from restaurants to retail.

- Pay with Ease
Use Apple Pay or Google Pay to make fast, secure payments directly from your phone.

- Get Exclusive Offers
Unlock special deals and make your benefits go even further.
- Enjoy a Seamless Experience

One app, all your benefits — designed to be fast, safe, and easy to use.
- Love the app? Let us know!

Your feedback helps us keep improving. Rate and review the app and help us shape the future of your Pluxee experience.

Представямe Ви приложението Pluxee

Открийте свят на възможности с новото приложение Pluxee! Използвайте социалните си придобивки в интуитивна и сигурна платформа. Следете баланса и трансакциите си и открийте нови вълнуващи места около Вас. Да започваме!

Основни функции:

Удобно, сигурно и многофункционално:

Приложението Pluxee предлага отлично и сигурно потребителско изживяване. Вземете най-доброто от Pluxee в едно приложение.

Баланс и трансакции в реално време:

Получавате в реално време информация за Вашите баланси и трансакции, по всяко време и навсякъде. Край на изненадите - винаги ще знаете с какви средства разполагате.

Открийте нови места:

Получете повече от това, което наистина има значение и с едно натискане на бутон вижте къде може да пазарувате с Вашата карта.

Насладете се на изживяването с Pluxee още днес:

Изтеглете приложението Pluxee и открийте свят на възможности. Извлечете максимума от допълнителните си социални придобивките и се насладете на това, което е наистина важно за Вас.

Вашето мнение е от значение:

Ние ценим Вашата обратната връзка. Моля, оценете приложението Pluxee. Вашето мнение ни помага да подобрим клиентското изживяване и да ви предоставим най-доброто обслужване.

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Say more with Threads — Instagram’s text-based conversation app.

Threads is where communities come together to discuss everything from the topics you care about today to what’ll be trending tomorrow. Whatever it is you’re interested in, you can follow and connect directly with your favorite creators and others who love the same things — or build a loyal following of your own to share your ideas, opinions and creativity with the world!

A few things you can do on Threads…

■ Access your Instagram followers
Your Instagram username and verification badge are reserved for you. Automatically follow the same accounts you follow on Instagram in a few taps, and discover new accounts too.

■ Share your point of view
Spin up a new thread to express what's on your mind. This is your space to be yourself, and you control who can reply.

■ Connect with friends and your favorite creators
Jump to the replies to get in on the action and react to commentary, humor and insight from the creators you know and love. Find your community and connect with people who care about whatever it is you’re interested in.

■ Control the conversation
Customize your settings and use controls to manage who can see your content, reply to your threads, or mention you. Accounts you’ve blocked will carry over from Instagram, and we’re enforcing the same Community Guidelines to help ensure everyone interacts safely and authentically. 

■ Find ideas and inspiration
From TV recommendations to career advice, get answers to your questions or learn something new from crowd-sourced conversations, thought leaders and industry experts.

■ Never miss a moment
Stay on top of the latest trends and live events. Whether it’s about new music, movie premieres, sports, games, TV shows, fashion, or the latest product releases, find discussions and receive notifications any time your favorite profiles start a new thread.

■ Leap into the fediverse
Threads is part of the fediverse, a global, open, social network of independent servers operated by third parties around the world. Servers share information with each other to enable people to connect and discover new things across the fediverse.


Meta Terms: https://www.facebook.com/terms.php

Evrotrust is a unique mobile app to make your work with e-documents as technically and legally secured, as it is in the paper world. It allows you to remotely identify yourself before banks, telecoms, the state, or just to password-less login to websites. Use it to remotely sign any kind of e-documents with qualified e-signature, having same legal effect as handwritten. Once signed, documents could be sent for qualified secure delivery to others as it was done by the well-known courier services.

MAIN FUNCTIONALITIES
• Remotely identify yourself through a new generation remote video identification, to avoid face-to-face appearance. The system secures automatic face recognition based on national ID documents (where such integration is in place) or by an operator.
• Remotely e-sign. Get free qualified certificates for e-signatures and e-seals, valid for 2 years. Use these to remotely create legally binding qualified e-signatures and e-seals.
• Securely send and receive e-documents from your mobile or from Internet. The qualified secure delivery service proves the sender, the recipient, the time and the integrity of the documents sent.

SELF-SIGNING
• Self-sign your own documents and send to others in seconds;
• Access to Evrotrust web-platform for uploading and sending documents to others for signing;
• Secure encrypted storage of all signed and received documents;
• Profile access from multiple smart devices.

INTEGRATED PARTNERS
• Remotely enroll as a client and e-sign at no cost with our integrated partners - banks, telecoms, etc.;
• Enjoy remote signing of documents for e-government services;
• Password-less login to many websites and control intrusive events.

SECURITY
• Sign with Touch ID or by your face;
• Create legally binding e-documents, remotely signed,delivered and time-stamped with evidential value.

SUBSCRIPTION PLANS
For personal use make choice of among three subscription plans:
• Free
  o Try the Evrotrust remote services free of charge;
  o 3 free remote signatures/identifications and receive documents from others;
  o Remotely request and get free qualified certificates, valid for 2 years and create legally binding qualified e-signatures.
• Plan 5 – Available at the application as an in-app purchase. It includes:
  o All features from the Free plan;
  o 5 remote signatures/identifications per month.
• Plan 100 – Available at the application as an in-app purchase. It includes:
  o All features from the Business plan;
  o 100 remote signatures/identifications per month.
All subscriptions are charged to user’s iTunes account and are automatically renewed until cancelled by user.
Downgrade to lower plan is allowed at any time. It takes effect as of the moment of expiry of the current plan. Same applies to cancellation of subscription.
For enterprise packages, please contact us.

COUNTRIES COVERED
• Check list: http://www.evrotrust.com/doc/eIDAS/Countries_en.html

LEGAL STATUS AND COMPLIANCE
• Legal status. Evrotrust Technologies JSC is a European Qualified Trust Service Provider according to Regulation (EC) 910/2014, listed at the TSL of the European Commission.

С m-Postbank достъпваш електронното банкиране на Пощенска банка и извършваш операции от твоето смарт устройство.
Какви са предимствата на m-Postbank:
• Информация за всички продукти и услуги, които използваш в Пощенска банка или за които са ти предоставени права – сметки, депозити, кредити, дебитни и кредитни карти.
• Преводи към цял свят, погасяване на задължения по кредити и кредитни карти, както и плащане на задължения към бюджетни организации.
• Незабавни преводи в България в лева, какво и в евро към банки в ЕИП.
• Плащане на битови сметки към над 800 търговеца и на задължения за местни данъци и такси към над 100 общини в България.
• Blink parking - плащане за паркиране в „синя“ и „зелена“ зона в 25 населени места.
• Създаване на списък с доверени получатели, към които нареждате преводи без допълнително потвърждение.
• Управление още от начален екран на бърз достъп до избрани услуги 
• Запазване на шаблони за бързо и удобно изпълнение на регулярни преводи.
• Улеснен вход в приложението - с ПИН код или биометрични данни.
• Информация за най-близките клонове и банкомати на Пощенска банка.
За да потвърждаваш преводи към сметки в други банки или към трети лица е необходимо да инсталираш и активираш приложението m-Token Postbank. 
m-Token Postbank е софтуерен токън, който отговаря на регулаторните изисквания за удостоверяване идентичността на потребителя и за потвърждаване съгласието му за изпълнение на електронни дистанционни платежни и неплатежни операции.
Повече информация и Общи условия за услугата електронно банково обслужване „Интернет банкиране“ на Пощенска банка може да намери на www.postbank.bgЗа съдействие при въпроси, свързани с мобилното банкиране m-Postbank, можеш да се свържеш денонощно с нас на кратък номер *7224 или на +35928166000 за клиенти извън България, както и чрез дигиталния ни асистент EVA, където ще получиш експертен съвет и съдействие.






With m-Postbank, you can access Postbank's internet banking and perform transactions directly from your smart device.
What are the advantages of new m-Postbank:
• Information on all products and services you use at Postbank – accounts, deposits, loans, debit and credit cards.• Transfers worldwide, loan and card payment installments, and the ability to pay obligations to governmental organizations.
• Instant transfers in Bulgaria in BGN, as well as in EUR to banks within the EEA.
• Payment of utility bills to over 800 merchants and local tax and fee obligations for more than 100 municipalities in Bulgaria.
• Blink parking – pay for parking in “blue” and “green” zones in 25 municipalities.
• Creating a list of trusted recipients to whom you can transfer funds without additional confirmation.
• Manage quick access to selected services directly from the home screen
• Simplified login with PIN or biometrics.
• Save templates for quick and convenient execution of regular transfers.
• Access to information on the nearest Postbank branches and ATMs.


To confirm transfers to third parties, you need to install and activate the m-Token Postbank app. m-Token Postbank is a software token that meets regulatory requirements for authorization of payment transactions in an electronic environment.


More information and Terms and Conditions for the "Internet Banking" electronic banking service of Postbank can be found at www.postbank.bg.

For assistance related to the m-Postbank, you can contact us 24/7 at short number *7224 or at +35928166000 for clients outside Bulgaria, as well as through our digital assistant EVA, where you will receive expert advice and support.

CapCut offers easy-to-use video editing functions, in-APP fonts and effects, advanced features such as keyframe animation, smooth slow-motion, chroma key, and stabilization, to help you capture and snip moments.

Create fancy videos with other unique features: auto captions, text-to-speech, motion tracking, and background removal. Show your personality and go viral on TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Facebook!

FEATURES
Basic video editing
• Trim and shorten clips and split or merge videos.
• Adjust video speed from 0.1x to 100x, and apply speed curves to clips.
• Animate video clips with incredible zoom in/out effects.
• Highlight the best moments with the freeze feature.
• Explore transition options with awesome effects on and between clips.

Advanced video editor
• Keyframe video animation is available for all settings.
• Edit videos to create smooth slow-motion with the optical flow feature and speed curve tool.
• Use the chroma key to remove specific colors from videos.
• Easy to arrange and preview clips on multi-track timeline.
• The stabilizing feature keeps video footage steady.

Intelligent features
• Auto captions: automate speech recognition and subtitles in videos.
• Text-to-speech: apply text-to-speech in multiple languages and voices.
• Background removal: automatically remove backgrounds.

Text & Stickers
• Add text to videos with different fonts and styles, choose unique text templates. Fonts can be imported locally.
• Subtitles can be added to the timeline of video tracks and can be moved and adjusted in one step.

Trending Effects & Filters
• Match video content with diverse filters that are updated weekly with the latest trends.
• Edit videos with hundreds of trending effects, including Glitch, Blur, 3D, etc.
• Add movie-style video filters or adjust video brightness, contrast, etc.

Music & Sound Effects
• Add millions of music clips and sound effects to videos.
• Extract audio, clips, and recordings from videos.

Easy to Share
• Custom video export resolution, HD video editor supports 4K 60fps exports and smart HDR.
• Adjust the format and share with your friends on social media platforms.

С приложение Еконт управлявате лесно своите пратки и намирате всичко нужно на едно място.

Какви са възможностите за вас?
- подготвяте лесно пратки от бутон Услуги или Пратки
- запазвате данните на вече готови пратки и ги ползвате като шаблон в бъдеще
- принтирате документ по пратката директно от приложението
- заявявате куриер с няколко клика
- проследявате пратките си и правите промени по тях в движение 
- плащате онлайн - с ecoints или банкова карта.

Какви други ползи имате?
- получавате информация за всичко ново от Еконт на начален екран
- дигиталният ни асистент Ена ви съдейства при въпроси
- подавате рекламации директно от пратка 
- следите рекламациите си в реално време и получавате становище в приложението.
- Двупосочна пратка -> подготви пратки в две посоки с 10% отстъпка
- Меню с отстъпки -> проследи Отстъпка напред и какво те очаква
- Коригирай подготвени пратки
- Дублирай подготвени пратки

Добавихме QR код към товарителниците на пратки в приложението за по-бързо и лесно обслужване в офис на Еконт.

Интегрирахме виртуалният ни асистент Ена в меню Свържи се с нас, която да помага при нужда, като оставихме и възможност за отделно подаване на нередност или препоръка в приложението.

Нови функционалности при Подготви пратка:
 - Добавен е избор за платец при връщане на пратка.
 - Добавена е проверка на адрес на получател с възможност за пренасочване към офис или смяна на локация при необходимост.
 - Добавена е възможност за добавяне на електронен опис на пратки за юридическите лица.

Ново:
- Тъмна тема -> настрой според желанието си

 С приложението DOUGLAS можеш да:

•	Получаваш безплатна доставка при поръчки над 100 лв.

DOUGLAS е много повече от просто онлайн магазин за парфюми – той е твоята персонална козметична дестинация, съчетаваща стил, красота и удобство. Наслади се на лесно и сигурно пазаруване – когато и където пожелаеш.

WhatsApp works across mobile, tablet, and desktop even on slow connections, with no subscription fees*.

Your privacy is our priority. With end-to-end encryption, you can be sure that your personal messages and calls stay between you and who you send them to. And no one, not even WhatsApp, can read or listen to them.

Simple and secure connections, right away

All you need is your phone number - no usernames or logins needed. Easily view your contacts on WhatsApp and start messaging. And what's more, you can easily  link your other devices, including iPads, for seamless connectivity.

High quality voice and video calls

Enjoy free, secure video and voice calls with up to 32 people for free. Your calls work across devices, even on slower connections, using your phone or tablet’s Internet service.

Group chats to keep you in contact

Stay close to friends and family through end-to-end encrypted group chats and calls. Share messages, photos, videos and documents across mobile, tablet, and desktop. You can also use call links and screen-sharing to make group calls and collaboration easy.

Stay connected in real time

You can share your location with those in your individual or group chats while using WhatsApp on your mobile phone. Or record a voice message for those moments when just text isn't good enough.

Share daily moments through Status

Share your everyday life with those who matter. With Status you can share text, photos, video, and GIF updates that disappear after 24 hours. You're always in control of who sees your status. Just choose who you want to share it with - all your contacts or selected ones. And bring your everyday to life.
